definition: any natural satellite of a planet, expose one's buttocks to
details:
noun
- any natural satellite of a planet
= example: any natural satellite of a planet
- the natural satellite of the Earth
- any object resembling a moon
= example: any object resembling a moon
- the period between successive new moons (29.531 days)
= synonyms: lunar month, lunation, synodic month
verb
- expose one's buttocks to
= example: expose one's buttocks to
- be idle in a listless or dreamy way
= synonyms: moon around, moon on
- have dreamlike musings or fantasies while awake
= synonyms: daydream
